name: Match Five!
description:
Most addictive puzzle ever.

How to play:

• Drag a shape from bottom pool onto vacant space of the playing field;
• Form a figure of five or more connected blocks of the same color OR form a full line of blocks of any color either horizontally or vertically to score;
• Unlock new colors to double your score;
• Keep the blocks from filling the playfield.

Have a good time with Match Five!
